name: CPMessageListItemTrailingConfiguration
desc: An object that describes the appearance of a message list item’s trailing region.

items.name: init(trailingItem: CPMessageTrailingItem, trailingImage: UIImage?)
items.desc: Creates a trailing configuration that contains an item and an image.

items.name: let CPMaximumMessageItemImageSize: CGSize
items.desc: The maximum size of a message list item’s image.

items.name: enum CPMessageTrailingItem
items.desc: The accessories that a message list item can display in its trailing region.
